revision.comment: Omega moved page [[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter]] to [[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter (ER-8)]]
revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=EdgeRouter |revision=(ER-8) |asin=B00IA5M2AS |newegg=9SIAHSBBCW9732 |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=Currently Shipping |type=router |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=C5 |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN6120 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=SanDisk |fla1_model=SDIN7DP2-4G |fla2=8 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX29LV640ETTI-70G |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Kingston |ram1_model=KVR16S11S6/2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, J2 |serial=yes,, console,, RJ45,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=B50280C1;B50280C1KFBG; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=8 |addl_chips=16Mbit SPI Serial Flash;cFeon;QH16-104HIP;;1; ,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3221C;;1; ,,, PCIe 3.0 Clock Generator with 1 HCSL Outputs;Pericom;P16C557;;1; ,,, 3A, 4.5-27V Simple Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AOZ1212;;4; ,,, 1MHz, 2.0A, Synchronous-Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi; uP9617;;5; ,,, 30V N-Channel Power MOSFET;CYStech Electronics;MTB11N03Q8;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel Power MOSFET;Unisonic Tech;UT4392G;;1; ,,, 3-State Quad Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;74LVC125A;;5; ,,, 2A Schottky Barrier Rectifier;Diodes Inc;B260/A;;4; |flags=metal case, fan, heatsink, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2012.04.01; |stock_os=Linux;4.9.79-UBNT;Debian 9; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=ubnt |default_pass=ubnt |oui_eth=B4:FB:E4 }} {{TagLine|Ubiquiti EdgeMAX EdgeRouter (ER-8)}} :''8-Port Router'' (Rack 19") :[https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/edgerouter/ Product page] {{•}} [https://help.ubnt.com/hc/en-us/categories/200321064-EdgeMAX Support page] :[https://www.ui.com/downloads/datasheets/edgemax/EdgeRouter_DS.pdf Datasheet] {{•}}[https://www.ui.com/downloads/guides/edgemax/EdgeOS_UG.pdf User's Guide] {{•}} [https://www.ui.com/downloads/qsg/ER-8/ Quick Start Guide]
'EDGE_ROUTER_PRO (NO SFP)' is silkscreened on the board.
===Model Comparison=== :[[Ubiquiti Networks]] • [https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/comparison/ EdgeMAX Model Comparison] *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 4 (ER-4)]] - e300 :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN7130 @1GHz ''Octeon III'' (Quad Core MIPS64) :Ports: 3x GbE, 1x SFP, 1x USB 3.0; Performance: 3.4Mpps *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 6P (ER-6P)]] :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN7130 @1GHz ''Octeon III'' (Quad Core MIPS64) :Ports: 5x GbE, 1x SFP, 1x USB 3.0; Performance: 3.4Mpps :PoE Support: 5x 24V passive 2-pair/4-pair PoE *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter PRO]] (ERPro-8) - e200 :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN6120 @1GHz ''Octeon II'' (Dual Core MIPS64) :Ports: (6+2)x GbE, 2x SFP, 1x USB 2.0; Performance: 1.8Mpps *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter]] (ER-8) - e200 :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN6120 @800MHz ''Octeon II'' (Dual Core MIPS64) :Ports: (6+2)x GbE, 1x USB 2.0; Performance: 1.8Mpps *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter LITE]] (ERLite-3) - e110 :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN5020 @500MHz ''Octeon +'' (Dual Core MIPS64) :Ports: 3x GbE, 1x USB 2.0, Console; Performance: 0.7Mpps *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter POE]] (ERPoe-5) - e110 :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN5020 @500MHz ''Octeon +'' (Dual Core MIPS64) :Ports: 5x GbE, 1x USB 2.0, Console; Performance: 0.7Mpps :PoE Support: 5x 24V/48V/Passive 2-pair/4-pair PoE :*[[Ubiquiti Networks Unifi Security Gateway (USG)]] - e100 *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter X]] (ER-X)/(ER-X-SFP) - e50 :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621AT @880MHz (Dual Core MIPS1004KEc) :Ports: 5x GbE, 2x PoE (in/out), (1x SFP); Performance: 1.4Mpps :*[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter X SFP]] (ER-X-SFP) - e50 *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter Infinity (ER-8-XG)]] • [https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/edgerouter-infinity/ PPage] :CPU: [[Cavium]] [https://cavium.com/octeon-III-CN73XX-CN72XX-mips64-processors.html CN7360] @1.8GHz ''Octeon III'' (16x Core MIPS64) :8-Port 10G SFP+ Router (80Gbps), 4GB Flash, 16GB DDR4 RAM :Ports: 1x GbE, 8x SFP, 1x USB 3.0, Console; Performance: 18Mpps
__NOTOC__
